scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:webpack && npm run build:jekyll && npm run build:html-minifier
scripts.build:gh-pages: npm run clean && npm run build:webpack:gh-pages && npm run build:jekyll:gh-pages && npm run build:html-minifier
scripts.build:jekyll: cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build:jekyll:gh-pages: cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,config/jekyll/_config.gh-pages.yml
scripts.start: npm run clean && webpack --progress --profile --colors && concurrently --names "Jekyll,Webpack" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm:start:jekyll" "wait-on http://localhost:4000 && npm run start:webpack-dev-server"
